The Thermo Scientific Accela PDA is optimized for the detection of high speed chromatographic separations.

title: Accela Autosampler
short_description: Thermo Scientific Accela High Speed LC provides fast
full_description:
Thermo Scientific Accela High Speed LC provides fast, efficient chromatographic separations over a range of flowrates and pressures for HPLC and UHPLC in a single system using the industry's only quaternary high pressure pump.  
    
Accela is designed to optimize performance of sub-two micron particle columns, providing seamless operation from conventional LC pressures up to 1250 bar for U-HPLC separations of complex matrices.

title: SpectrAA Atomic Absorption Spectrometer
full_description:
Atomic absorption spectroscopy (AAS) is a spectroanalytical procedure for the quantitative determination of chemical elements using the absorption of optical radiation (light) by free atoms in the gaseous state.

In analytical chemistry the technique is used for determining the concentration of a particular element (the analyte) in a sample to be analyzed. AAS can be used to determine over 70 different elements in solution or directly in solid samples used in pharmacology, biophysics and toxicology research.

title: Single Wall Gravity Convection Laboratory Oven
FTIR
full_description: Fourier transform infrared spectroscopy (FTIR) is a technique which is used to obtain an infrared spectrum of absorption or emission of a solid, liquid or gas. An FTIR spectrometer simultaneously collects high spectral resolution data over a wide spectral range. This confers a significant advantage over a dispersive spectrometer which measures intensity over a narrow range of wavelengths at a time.

title: UV-Vis
full_description: Ultraviolet–visible spectroscopy or ultraviolet-visible spectrophotometry (UV-Vis or UV/Vis) refers to absorption spectroscopy or reflectance spectroscopy in the ultraviolet-visible spectral region. This means it uses light in the visible and adjacent (near-UV and near-infrared [NIR]) ranges. The absorption or reflectance in the visible range directly affects the perceived color of the chemicals involved. In this region of the electromagnetic spectrum, molecules undergo electronic transitions. This technique is complementary to fluorescence spectroscopy, in that fluorescence deals with transitions from the excited state to the ground state, while absorption measures transitions from the ground state to the excited state.

title: Spectrofluorophotometer
full_description: A spectrofluorometer is an instrument which takes advantage of fluorescent properties of some compounds in order to provide information regarding their concentration and chemical environment in a sample. A certain excitation wavelength is selected, and the emission is observed either at a single wavelength, or a scan is performed to record the intensity versus wavelength, also called an emission spectra.

title: NanoScope IIIa Scanning Probe Microscope Controller
Thermal Analysis System
full_description: Thermogravimetric analysis or thermal gravim analysis (TGA) is a method of thermal analysis in which changes in physical and chemical properties of materials are measured as a function of increasing temperature (with constant heating rate), or as a function of time (with constant temperature and/or constant mass loss).

title: Heating and Cooling Device Polar Bear Plus
DryFast
short_description: Brand-New Welch 2034 DryFast Chemical Duty PTFE Dry Diaphragm Pump, w/ built in vacuum regulator
full_description:
Chemical resistant Research Model 2034 pump is perfect for MeCl2 and other volatile solvent rotary evaporations. Achieve precise vacuum control down to 9 torr using convenient adjustment knob. Includes built in vacuum regulator with 25 lpm flow enabling multi-user use for organic solvent filtrations and other routine chemistry lab operations. This allows fume discharge to your hood. Modern, compact design weighs only 21.3 lbs.

Buy the DRYFAST® pump for the vacuum levels you need. Lower vacuum levels are required to drive evaporation of volatile solvents. Use solvent volatility criteria above to size your pump for safe, high-yield evaporations at 35° C. Operating voltage range 100-230 VAC, 50/60Hz.

title: Freeze Dryer
full_description:
VirTis® BenchTop™ “K” Series Freeze Dryers were developed to meet the demand for a research Freeze Dryer that would provide a full range of laboratory processing capability. The compact design plus the wide range of options and accessories make these freeze dryers the most versatile available. 
 
The BenchTop “K” Series Freeze Dryers are offered in a range of condenser temperatures from -55°C to -105°C. This wide range of condenser temperatures provides the drying power required to freeze dry all aqueous and most organic based samples. Condenser sizes range from 3 to 9 liters, allowing for processing of a few samples or multiple user applications.

title: Culture Incubator Type 37900
full_description:
Analog cultute incubator,Temperature range: ambient to 60 °C and Platform size: 10″ x 8″.
Uses minimum space, the heating element is mounted on the back of the unit to allow dishes to be placed directly on the floor with out overheating, aluminum lined chamber contains a removable floor and middle shelf, has port on the top for a immersion thermometer for temperature monitoring, 30?C to 65?C temperature range, ?0.4C at 30?C temperature uniformity unloaded, 132 dish (160x15mm) capacity, 10x8x63/4chamber dimensions, 120V, 50/60Hz, 50W.

title: General Purpose Centrifuge
full_description:
IEC Centra 8R developed by Thermo IEC is a tabletop refrigerated instrument that is ideal to address various centrifugal needs.

IEC Centra 8R has many functions that make it ideal for any clinic or laboratory setting. This centrifuge system with 216 4-place swinging rotors and 378-S 750ml capacity cups, features digital temperature and speed control and readouts. The instrument also includes adjustable timer (1 to 59 minute) and variable temperature (0 to 39c). The overall size of this device is 17.5 inch x 23 inch x 30 inch (HxWxD) and it has a maximum performance speed of 5,900 rpm.

title: Hood 1300 Series A2
short_description: 1300 Series A2 Class II Type A2 Biological Safety Cabinet from Thermo Fisher Scientific (LPG)
full_description:
Thermo Scientific* 1300 Series A2 Class II, Type A2 Biological Safety Cabinet Packages feature everything required to get started including cabinet, manual adjustable height stand, factory installed UV light and one set of armrests. Thermo Scientific 1300 Series A2, Class II, Type A2 biological safety cabinets deliver exceptional design and technology advancements such as superior protection with proprietary airflow design, exceptional ergonomics for a safe and comfortable environment, and outstanding energy efficiency for operational cost savings.

Thermo Scientific 1300 Series A2 features advancements in brushless DC motor technology for dramatically improved energy efficiency, safety performance, and reliability. SmartClean offers a window cleaning position that provides the user access to interior of window sash. SmartPort provides a clean and easy way to organize the interior of the 1300 Series A2, with confidence due to our negative pressure dual-side wall.

model: Magnet System 300 MHz/54mm UltraShield, long hold time
full_description: Nuclear magnetic resonance (NMR) is a physical phenomenon in which nuclei in a magnetic field absorb and re-emit electromagnetic radiation.

title: Laser Diode Driver
full_description:
The Newport Model 500 / 500AN Series Laser Diode Drivers are low noise, highly stable current sources for use with laser diodes. Selectable output current ranges allow you to choose the laser current range having the optimum resolution for your application. Two operating modes, constant current and constant laser power are vailable. A monitor photodiode can be zero biased or reverse biased up to 5 volts without resorting to external power supplies. Redundant FET and relay shorting circuits protect the laser diode during the beginning of a soft-start sequence. After a short delay the output current slowly ramps up to the operating set-point. A current LIMIT setting unconditionally protects the output from exceeding the laser diode's maximum specified operating current independent of operating mode. An external analog modulation input allows voltage controlling the output and a low cost alternative for remote control and monitoring of the laser diode can be implemented using the Analog Interface Card. Model 500 / 500AN Series Laser Diode Drivers are equipped with an Analog Interface, enabling remote control and monitoring of the laser diode.


Product Family: 500, 5OO, Model 501, Model 501AN, Model 505, Model 505AN, Model 525, Model 525AN, Model 560, Model 560AN

title: E.S.R. Meter
full_description: The 273A Digital ESR Meter measures Equivalent Series Resistance values from 0.1 milliohm to 20 ohms. The unit handles any type of capacitance with values from 5000 pF up to 1 farad. It allows production line monitoring in capacitor manufacture and 100% incoming inspection for capacitor users. BDC outputs standard.

title: Dell PowerEdge Rack Console 15FP
full_description:
When your server reaches the limits of its internal storage capacity, the Dell PowerVault 220S rack-optimized direct-attached SCSI enclosure offers cost-efficient external storage expansion for Dell PowerEdge servers and PowerVault storage servers. Supporting popular industry standards such as Ultra320 (U320) SCSI, SES and SAF-TE specifications, these enclosures are designed for easy installation and configuration. And when it comes to upgrades or servicing, the chassis design helps make maintenance a snap. The 220S offers safety and reliability with dual Hot-Plug Redundant power supplies.

These arrays were recently removed from a professional data center environment. They were shipped NEW from Dell and were only owned and operated by one organization.  They are in excellent physical condition and have been tested and certified to be in good working order.

title: Dell PowerEdge SC
full_description:
The Dell PowerEdge SC1425 is a low cost rack-dense, high performance server intended for clustered environments, such as web server farms, VMWare or Linux HPCC's. The lack of redundancy (single power supply only) or hardware RAID helps to keep the overall cost of the system quite low, but also makes its preferred role in the datacenter much more specific. If you are looking for a highly redundant, standalone unit, the 1425 may not be the system for you. However, if you are looking for a high-performance system to be used in a clustered environment, with a low price tag, the Dell SC1425 may be the perfect candidate.

The SC1425 features the Intel® E7520 chipset (same as its cousin the PE 1850), with support for up to two 64-bit Xeon processors at up to 3.8GHz (Single or Dual-Core) with an 800MHz front side bus, as well as a maximum of 2TB of storage and 16GB of DDR-2 400 SDRAM. Sold primarily in low-priced lots of 5, 10 or more, the SC1425 may be just what you've been looking for in a high performance cluster solution.

title: FS3100 System with Autosampler and Dispenser
Pierce Heating Module and Evaporation Unit
full_description: Perform derivatization and other small-scale reactions reliably and with ease using the Thermo Scientific™ Reacti-Therm™ Heating and Stirring module. This module has dry block heaters that provide uniform, stable heating between 10–200 °C. The Reacti-Therm heater/stirrer is available in four models—single block and triple block sizes with either heat-only or heat-and-stir capability. This versatile system is compatible with a range of interchangeable accessories, for applications on small samples for a range of applications. - See more at: http://www.thermoscientific.com/en/product/reacti-therm-dry-block-sample-incubation-system.html#sthash.Rfj5EdL9.dpuf
